exceptions.tactic: intros p I d cohI cohI_d.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
p: protocol
I: dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop
d: dstatelet
d0: dstatelet

Goal:
cohI d -> valid (dstate d)

Premises:
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
protocol = Protocols.protocol : Type
cohI = [Pred d | coh d /\ I d (nodes p d)] : Simpl_Pred dstatelet
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
nid = nat : Set
Notation valid := valid
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
cohpred_PredType = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => mkPredType (Coherence.sort (nodes:=nodes)) : (dstatelet -> pred nid) -> PredType dstatelet Arguments cohpred_PredType _%function_scope
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
pred0v1 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dstate d)
Coherence.sort : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, Coherence.cohpred nodes -> dstatelet -> Prop
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
CohPred : forall (T : dstatelet -> pred nid) (m : dstatelet -> Prop), Coherence.mixin_of T m -> Coherence.cohpred T
Coherence.Pack : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (sort : dstatelet -> Prop), Coherence.mixin_of nodes sort -> Coherence.cohpred nodes
Protocols.nodes = fun p : Protocols.protocol => let (nodes, _, coh, snd_trans, rcv_trans, _, _) := p in nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
receive_trans : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> Type
Transitions.receive_step_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> Type
send_trans : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> Type
t_rcv : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> nat
t_snd : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nat
receive_step : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
pred0v3 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> dom (dstate d) =i [::]
Record cohpred (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) : Type := Pack { sort : dstatelet -> Prop; _ : Coherence.mixin_of nodes sort } Arguments Coherence.cohpred _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Pack [nodes sort]%function_scope
pred0v2 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dsoup d)
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
cohMT = eq^~ empty_dstatelet : dstatelet -> Prop
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
send_step : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh), Transitions.send_step_t (Transitions.send_safe s)
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> getLocal n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
locE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (n : nid) (x : heap) (y : soup), valid (dstate d) -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n x (dstate d); dsoup := y |} = x
cohpred = Coherence.cohpred : (dstatelet -> pred nid) -> Type Arguments cohpred _%function_scope
valid_true : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), valid f1 -> valid f2 -> (forall x : K, x \in dom f1 -> x \notin dom f2) -> validUn_spec f1 f2 true
step_preserves_node_ids : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (l : Label), l \in dom s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) =i dom (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
CohUn : forall (w1 w2 : world) (s1 s2 : state), Coh w1 s1 -> Coh w2 s2 -> valid (w1 \+ w2) -> Coh (w1 \+ w2) (s1 \+ s2)

``` 
intros p I d cohI cohI_d. unfold cohI in cohI_d. destruct cohI_d as [coh_d I_dn]. apply coh_d.
```

original: intros p I d cohI cohI_d. unfold cohI in cohI_d. destruct cohI_d as [coh_d I_dn]. apply coh_d.
